meanings.definition: The quality or state of being lively.
meanings.sent1: Her livelinesses brightened up the room.
meanings.sent2: The children played with great livelinesses in the park.
meanings.sent3: The livelinesses of the puppy made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The livelinesses of the city streets were like a bustling river.
meanings.sent5: The livelinesses of the party were contagious and unforgettable.

meanings.definition: The state of being full of energy or excitement.
meanings.sent1: The livelinesses of the concert crowd was infectious.
meanings.sent2: She danced with such livelinesses that everyone joined in.
meanings.sent3: The livelinesses of the soccer match kept the fans on their toes.
meanings.sent4: The livelinesses of the market were like a whirlwind of activity.
meanings.sent5: His eyes sparkled with livelinesses as he shared his adventure.
